boardgame.name: Aladdin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Dragons
Morgenland
boardgame.description: After the immediate response to Richard Breese's Keydom at Essen 1999, Hans im Glück contracted to take the basic game idea and produce a version of the game. Aladdin's Dragons, or Morgenland in the original German, is the product of their cooperation._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game features players putting numbered bidding chips face-down onto the board sequentially. After the players have placed all of their chips, then each of the areas is resolved. The bottom part of the board is where players attempt to gather treasure tokens, which is the overall currency of the game. The middle part of the board features a number of special actions, which help the players cast spells, trade in their resource tokens, or block other players' actions. The top part of the board is where players use treasure tokens to purchase artifacts, and the player who can collect the most artifacts by the end of the game will be the victor._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Won Games Magazine Game of the Year award in 2001._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implements:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Keydom_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Aladdin's Dragons (card game version by same name as board game)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Microbadges: (Buy One)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Aladdin's Dragons fan_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

the re-release of the famous and rare KEYDOM from RICHARD BREESE +++++ never played +++++ first german edition +++++ will be shipped with insurance +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ payment for usa and canada : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for asia and australia: cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ countries, that have no euro : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich is cost-free !) +++++ payment for european countries, that have no euro : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ for all : no checks ! +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped), pleask at for prices, befor you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros

Game is NOT in it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s shrinkwrap, but is unplayed. A handfull of tiles/markers have fallen out of the die cuts, but the majority are still in the sprues. One artifact tile was punched, and has had a bit of tearing on the back, but it is a Lamp tile, which everyone gets to start the game with, so this will in NO WAY impact play. The cards are still in their shrinkwrap.

BRANDNEW: I´m offering the German Hans im Glück edition with beautiful artwork. Mint condition (still in foil!) All games come from a private collection! Please contact me if you´re looking for more interesting German games as I can offer a lot more. Buyer pays postage, so ask before buying to determine the weight of your desired games! The following payments are welcome: (1) Cash in a registered letter (only Euro accepted) or (2) Chargefree EU Bank-Transfer (using IBAN and SWIFT) or (3) Moneybookers.com (it´s as fast and safe as PayPal but much cheaper: maximum fee is 0.50 EUR) or (4) PayPal (for PayPal payment please add +5 % of the total sum). 999 Games – Morgenland Language: Dutch 3 to 5 players 10 year and older Duration: about 60 min New -- mint condition -- unopened -- still in shrink wrap. Weight: 1,440 kg Theme: After the immediate response to Richard Breese_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Keydom at Essen 1999, Hans im Glück contracted to take the basic game idea and produce a version of the game. Aladdin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Dragons, or Morgenland in the original German, is the product of their cooperation. The game features players putting numbered bidding chips face-down onto the board sequentially. After the players have placed all of their chips, then each of the areas is resolved. The bottom part of the board is where players attempt to gather treasure tokens, which is the overall currency of the game. The middle part of the board features a number of special actions, which help the players cast spells, trade in their resource tokens, or block other players_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; actions. The top part of the board is where players use treasure tokens to purchase artifacts, and the player who can collect the most artifacts by the end of the game will be the victor. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Condition notes: Aladdin_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Dragons (Rio Grande Games edition) -- Like New. Open but unplayed. All components present and in excellent condition. This beautifully produced game is currently out of print and hard to find! ------------------------------------------------ I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m in the process of cleaning out the game cabinet. Look back for more deals later. For open and played games, expect prices below what you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d pay at an online discounter. Shipping: I will ship most games USPS Priority Mail using a flat rate box plus Shipping Confirmation - Estimated Actual Cost: $12.45. I will make every attempt to get you the cheapest and most timely shipping possible. All games come from a non-smoking, careful environment. I hope you enjoy owning and playing these games as much as I have. I accept Paypal or Money Order or Cashiers Check. I do not accept personal checks because I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t ship your game quickly with that payment method. Currently only shipping to the U.S. If you are in a foreign country and really want one of these games, contact me and I will try to accommodate you - be aware that international shipping costs may be substantially higher.

Only played a couple times. All components present and in excellent condition. Box has very minimal shelf wear. ~ ~ ~ I will ship via USPS, and will charge only exact shipping (no handling fee) once I know the destination, and your preferred shipping method (Priority, Parcel-Post, Insurance, etc). PayPal is preferred. Otherwise, prepaying with Money Order or Cashiers Check will insure fast shipping. Personal checks will require a few days for clearance.

This is the Rio Grande Games (English language) edition. Minus the shrink this is as new as it could get. Buyer to pay actual USPS Priority shipping. Personal checks must clear prior to shipment. Thank you!
